alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WAKULLA...SOUTHEASTERN GADSDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN LEON COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodville, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, St. Marks, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, and Eight Mile Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon
